channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 22:12 Driven the alarm to the Uman District. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 22:12 Driven the alarm to the Uman District. Watch for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 22:12 Drawing anxiety in Zvenigorod district.Creck on further reports.
item.description: 🟢 22:12 Drawing anxiety in Zvenigorod district.Creck on further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 22:12 Dumping anxiety in the Cherkasy region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Uman district- Zvenigorod district- Cherkasy district- Zolotonsky district
item.description: 🟡 22:12 Dumping anxiety in the Cherkasy region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Uman district- Zvenigorod district- Cherkasy district- Zolotonsky district#Cherkasy_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 22:12 Drive alarm to Vinnytsia region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 22:12 Drive alarm to Vinnytsia region. Watch for further messages.#Vinnytsia_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 22:12 Driven the alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Stop by further messages.
item.description: 🟢 22:12 Driven the alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Stop by further messages.#Kirovograd This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
